stories.text:
Hi Indiehackers!

I created a way to help newsletter creators grow their newsletter!

A couple of weeks ago, Twitter announced they were enabling content creators to add a "subscribe" button to their Twitter profile! This is super exciting and might be a gamechanger for a lot of creators, but there is just one big problem...

New subscribers will be added to Twitter's newsletter tool, called Revue...

Switching to Revue is a lot of work Revue is missing some critical features Revue can get pretty expensive

What if I told you that you can now use the new "subscribe" button, without having to switch to Revue?

Introducing RevSync RevSync makes it easy to capture new subscribers via your Twitter profile and sync them to your current newsletter tool!

Grow your newsletter Set up once, use forever Cheap EarlyBird plan available
stories.title: Show HN: RevSync – Turn your Twitter followers in newsletter subscribers
